column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The server went beyond the specialized menu to explain which items the table ordered could be consumed and why certain items weren't gluten-free due to cross-contamination (i.e. the burrata could be eaten
column2: but isn't included on the gluten-free menu because it comes with toast and the patatas bravas aren't gluten-free because they're cooked in the fryer with breaded foods).
